title: Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park: Guest Speakers
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Guest Speakers                 Guest Speakers       Attention school teachers!   Canal Classroom Corps teachers  and Park Rangers may be available to come to your classroom.   Email our staff to make arrangements!       Bringing the park to your classroom! A Ranger delivers a program to students at their school. NPS Photo        A Ranger discusses the natural resources of the canal, including fossils, flora, and fauna. Image Courtesy of National Park Trust
